title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 440.12 - Alternate grant awards
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 440.12 - Alternate grant awards

State Regulations

In a given funding cycle, applications which rate highly
but for which insufficient funds are available may be selected as alternate
grant awards. These applications may be retained by the office and may be used
to select alternate projects to fund in the event that a project is cancelled
by the office, abandoned by its sponsor or funds become otherwise
available. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
440.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
